query:
-- 創建 alert_notifications 表（警報通知記錄）
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS alert_notifications (
  id INT AUTO_INCREMENT PRIMARY KEY,
  user_id INT NOT NULL,
  subscription_id INT NOT NULL,
  alert_type ENUM('suspicious_trade', 'large_trade', 'price_spike', 'high_suspicion_address') NOT NULL,
  title VARCHAR(500) NOT NULL,
  message TEXT NOT NULL,
  metadata JSON COMMENT '額外的元數據（地址、市場、交易詳情等）',
  is_read BOOLEAN DEFAULT FALSE,
  created_at TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
  INDEX idx_user_id (user_id),
  INDEX idx_subscription_id (subscription_id),
  INDEX idx_alert_type (alert_type),
  INDEX idx_is_read (is_read),
  INDEX idx_created_at (created_at),
  FOREIGN KEY (subscription_id) REFERENCES alert_subscriptions(id) ON DELETE CASCADE
)
command:
mysql --batch --raw --column-names --default-character-set=utf8mb4 --host gateway02.us-east-1.prod.aws.tidbcloud.com --port 4000 --user 4EZig2ebo1q21z8.root --database 4sa6kfx5mFXsBhiWnpTsNp --execute -- 創建 alert_notifications 表（警報通知記錄）
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS alert_notifications (
  id INT AUTO_INCREMENT PRIMARY KEY,
  user_id INT NOT NULL,
  subscription_id INT NOT NULL,
  alert_type ENUM('suspicious_trade', 'large_trade', 'price_spike', 'high_suspicion_address') NOT NULL,
  title VARCHAR(500) NOT NULL,
  message TEXT NOT NULL,
  metadata JSON COMMENT '額外的元數據（地址、市場、交易詳情等）',
  is_read BOOLEAN DEFAULT FALSE,
  created_at TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
  INDEX idx_user_id (user_id),
  INDEX idx_subscription_id (subscription_id),
  INDEX idx_alert_type (alert_type),
  INDEX idx_is_read (is_read),
  INDEX idx_created_at (created_at),
  FOREIGN KEY (subscription_id) REFERENCES alert_subscriptions(id) ON DELETE CASCADE
)
